name: Water Park: Water Slide
description:
Water Park: Water slide is a fun summer, water slide based game.
This is fun game in which you can enjoy all the amazing rides which are in the real water park.
You can enjoy your ride just like the real experience and
fell like the water is all around you and enjoy the thrill of the water

- Lots of different rides to choose from
- Tilt mobile from left to right to collect coins
- Less in size so easy to download and user friendly


Have fun!!!
